frame.name: Domain
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Predicate</fen> is said to apply in a particular <fen>Domain</fen>. The understanding of the relation between <fen>Domain</fen> and <fen>Predicate</fen> depends on the nature of the <fen>Predicate</fen>. When the <fen>Predicate</fen> is a complete proposition, then a <fen>Domain</fen> adverbial also functions as a topic restrictor. Sentences with topic restrictors often come in pairs. When the <fen>Predicate</fen> is a simple predicate, there is no notion of topic restriction on the sentence level.
<ex>The Normal College is <fex name="Domain"><t>geographically</t></fex> <fex name="Predicate">adjacent to the University of North Wales</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Domain"><t>Geographically</t></fex>, <fex name="Predicate">Britain is a group of island off the mainland of Europe</fex>. <fex name="Domain"><t>Culturally</t></fex> , <fex name="Predicate">it has always been linked to the continent</fex> .</ex> <ex><fex name="Domain"><t>Socially</t></fex> and demographically <fex name="Predicate">the period has been dominated by two factors -- the fall in the size of families and the increase in the expectation of survival to retirement , the effects of which are still far from having exhausted themselves </fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Predicate
FE.definition:
<def-root>This Frame Element denotes the <fen>Predicate</fen> which is applied to the <fen>Domain</fen>.
<ex>This policy is not <t>economically</t> <fex name="Predicate">sound</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>This Frame Element applies to the <fen>Domain</fen> in which the <fen>Predicate</fen> is said to apply.
<ex>Britain and France are close , not only <t><fex name="Domain">geographically</fex></t> , but also strategically .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: financially.adv
lexUnit.definition: FN: of or relating to finance

lexUnit.name: in terms.idio
lexUnit.definition: COD: with regard to the aspect or subject specified
